title: APLKER Placemats and Coasters Set of 6, Heat Insulation PU Leather Table Mats Waterproof Washable Dining Place Mats for Kitchen Indoor Outdoor Party, 16 x12 inch - Dark Green
features: High Quality Materials : The placemats are made of PVC materials, double sided. stitching around edges, making it more classic and durable.Top-grade exquisite placemats would be the best decoration and protection to your tables.

Waterproof & Wipeable : The table mats are waterproof and wipeable, liquids and crumbs can't penetrate placemats. If you accidentally stain the placemat, gently wipe it down to clean it. dries very quickly.

Good Heat Resistance : The table mats are heat resistant, wear-resistant ,non-fading, temperature should not exceed 80°C, please make sure the food and utensils are under this temperature to protect your table.

Perfect Decor : The mats can not only serve as a table mat but also as a perfect office pad. Suitable for many occasions. , such as home kitchen, dining table, office room, study room, coffee shop, restaurant, hotel or business office; Perfect for party,holiday,resaurant,great gifts for your friends.
Package & Size: 6 placemats + 6 coasters, placemats size :16 x12 inch(41cm x 31cm), coasters diameter is 4 inch, Packed flat, it won't wrinkle,curl.
description: Product Description Welcome to APLKER Our placemats are made of the faux leather which is elegant, exquisite workmanship, strong and durable, very suitable for family, guests usage or gave as a gift, bringing you and your guests a star hotel-like atmosphere and setting off the atmosphere. Heat-resistant and Waterproof characteristics also make this placemat a good helper for you. Use this placemat to enjoy the food. Choose APLKER placemats to bring a different style experience to your kitchen restaurant. Your satisfaction is our top priority, we must try our best to serve you until you're satisfied with us! CARE INSTRUCTIONS: Do not put in microwave, oven, dishwasher, freezer or above a direct heat source. Do Not sink in water for long time. Wipe dry every time after you clean it. Please make sure that the temperature of the printing plate is cool or ≤176°F (80°C). It is normal for the PU leather placemats to have an little smell. Please put it in a ventilation for 2 days after you getting the product.

specifications_table.Care instructions: ‎Hand wash in warm soapy water and wipe dry. Do not machine wash.
